mapper.select: select top 5 id, name, address1_Line1 as address, dbo.getDistance(#{latitude}, address1_latitude, #{longitude}, address1_longitude) as distance from stores ORDER BY case when address1_longitude is not null and address1_latitude is not null then 1 else 0 END desc, distance asc
